text: Hoplodictya is a genus of marsh flies in the family Sciomyzidae. There are about five described species in Hoplodictya. ==Species== *H. acuticornis (Wulp, 1897) *H. australis Fisher and Orth, 1972 *H. kincaidi (Johnson, 1913) *H. setosa (Coquillett, 1901) *H. spinicornis (Loew, 1866) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * ==External links== * Category:Sciomyzidae Category:Sciomyzoidea genera
title: Hoplodictya
